articles.title: The Ever-Tenuous Success of Plants Engineered To Kill Insect Foes – The Wire Science - The Wire Science
articles.description: Bt crops keep many agricultural pests at bay and have drastically reduced the use of pesticides. But scientists warn that these valuable tools are in jeopardy due to overuse and abuse.
articles.content:
The cotton bollworm is a voracious pest that damages many crops, including cotton, but also corn, soybeans and tomatoes. Photo: USDA/Flickr CC BY 2.0
In 2006, a small airplane started buzzing each c… [+17251 chars]
